exec: /** Test function to show this kludge is working. */
tests["Response body uses json format"] = result;
tests["host list is well formated"] = tv4.validate(JSON.parse(responseBody), hostListSchema);
tests["service list is well formated"] = tv4.validate(JSON.parse(responseBody), serviceListSchema);
} + '; loadHelpers();'); // when eval'd out of globals, execute it
